text: Nnamdi Asomugha net worth and salary : Nnamdi Asomugha is an American professional football player who has a net worth of $ 20 million dollars. Nnamdi Asomugha was born in Lafayette, Louisiana, and grew up in Los Angeles, California. He played baseball and football throughout high school, and chose to attend the University of California – Berkeley, where he continued to play football. He graduated from UC – Berkeley with a degree in Corporate Finance, and was drafted by the Oakland Raiders in 2003. He went relatively unused during his first two seasons with the team, but he broke out in 2005. He played exceptionally well for the Raiders through 2010, regularly appearing on lists of the best players in the NFL. He was an All - Pro selection four times while with the Raiders, and a Pro
